reviews.text: I will give 2 stars to this station bcos of the facilities don't get me wrong it trying to keep clean but are some people that really don't care about others the station itself is very noticeable but as we notice don't have a disability walks in to the platforms staff well are not to many but like most of the time are friendly and kind and very helpful

Two delayed services. The one time I decide to come into London the day before for a meeting and take public transport, I'm late. It would have been easier, quicker, and probably cheaper to drive. I appreciate this isn't Catford Station's fault, but it's part of the incredibly sucky public transport system in this country.
Only one oyster card tapping machine available, no facilities for wheelchair.
Nice station but could do with some renovation
